paper_info.author: Vivek Nigam, Elaine Pimentel, and Giselle Reis.
paper_info.title: An extended framework for specifying and reasoning about proof systems
paper_info.citation:
Vivek Nigam, Elaine Pimentel, and Giselle Reis. An extended framework for specifying and reasoning about proof systems. J. Log. Comput., 26(2):539–576, 2016. Special issue in honor of Roy Dyckhoff.
The on-line tool, called TATU, implementing the techniques described in the paper can be found here
